name: Mar Hershenson
title: Co-Founder & Managing Partner
bio: Mar Hershenson is the Co-Founder and Managing Partner at Pear VC. Prior to founding Pear, Mar co-founded three companies: Revel Touch (e-commerce platform), Sabio Labs (web-based mobile semiconductor development platform, acquired by Magma Design Automation), and Barcelona Design (analog design automation company). Mar has a PhD in Electrical Engineering from Stanford University.
investment_philosophy: Building companies from scratch with strong technical insights and market vision.

name: Pejman Nozad
title: Co-Founder & Managing Partner
bio: Pejman Nozad is the Co-Founder and Managing Partner at Pear VC. Pejman is known for his remarkable journey from rug dealer to venture capitalist. His investment portfolio includes many successful companies like Dropbox, Lending Club, Zoosk, and many others. He has a unique talent for identifying exceptional founders early in their journey.
investment_philosophy: Betting on exceptional founders with strong drive and unique insights.

name: Ajay Kamat
title: Managing Partner
bio: Ajay Kamat is a Managing Partner at Pear VC. Prior to joining Pear, Ajay was the CEO of Wedding Party (acquired by Instacart). Ajay focuses on consumer, marketplace, and SaaS investments. He holds degrees from the University of Michigan and the Stanford Graduate School of Business.
investment_philosophy: Investing in founders who deeply understand their customers and are building products people love.

name: Nishika Gupta
title: Partner
bio: Nishika Gupta is a Partner at Pear VC focusing on enterprise software, AI, and infrastructure investments. Before Pear, Nishika was at Madrona Venture Group where she focused on early stage B2B investments. She has a technical background with experience at Microsoft and holds a BS in Computer Science from UT Austin and an MBA from Stanford GSB.
investment_philosophy: Backing technical founders building deep technology companies with strong moats.

name: Eric Feng
title: Managing Partner
bio: Eric Feng is a Managing Partner at Pear VC. He was previously CTO at Flipboard and Hulu, and a General Partner at Kleiner Perkins. Eric has founded multiple companies including Packagd (acquired by Facebook) and Erly (acquired by Airtime). He has a BS in Computer Engineering from the University of Texas at Austin.
investment_philosophy: Seeking founders with unique insights who are reshaping how we live, work, and play.

name: Vivian Wu
title: Partner
bio: Vivian Wu is a Partner at Pear VC focusing on healthcare and biotechnology investments. Before joining Pear, Vivian led investments at the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation and was at Longitude Capital. She holds an MBA from Harvard Business School and a BA from UC Berkeley.
investment_philosophy: Investing in transformative healthcare technologies that improve patient outcomes.

name: Roshan Sood
title: Partner
bio: Roshan Sood is a Partner at Pear VC focusing on B2B and enterprise software investments. Previously, Roshan was an investor at Bessemer Venture Partners and worked at Salesforce. He has a BS in Computer Science from Stanford University and an MBA from Harvard Business School.
investment_philosophy: Backing founders who transform how businesses operate through software.
